properties.implementation_description:
Written word recognition as part of the ADAScog. Instructions are given as follows:
"The patient reads aloud 12 high imagery words. These words are then randomly mixed with 12 words the patient has not seen. The patient indicates whether or not the word was shown previously. Then two more trials of reading the original words and recognition are given. The score equals the mean number of incorrect responses for three trials (maxi- mum= 12)."
